>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/settings/security"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the security settings for the modules specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ids","in":"query","description":"The list of module identifiers for which to retrieve the security settings.","style":"deepObject","schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"example":["some text"]}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
